decks.notes: The primary objective of the deck is to quickly and efficiently play Hive Mind along with other key cards like Show and Tell, Emrakul, the Aeons Torn, and various Pact spells. By utilizing cards like Brainstorm, Force of Will, and Intuition, the deck aims to establish a powerful board state that puts immense pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of lands like City of Traitors and Ancient Tomb allow for fast mana acceleration, while the deck's blue fetchlands provide additional consistency. Overall, the deck is designed to create overwhelming combos and win conditions that can lead to explosive victories.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game using a combination of counterspells, removal, and card draw while ramping up mana with Noble Hierarch and Natural Order to quickly bring out powerful creatures like Tarmogoyf and Progenitus. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with efficient threats, ultimately using its versatility and flexibility to adapt to different matchups and secure victory in Legacy 1 vs 1 format games.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble and play Hive Mind alongside Pact of the Titan, forcing the opponent to also cast a copy of Pact of the Titan which they are unable to pay for due to Hive Mind. This combo locks the opponent out of the game, securing the win for the player controlling the deck. The deck also includes powerful cards such as Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Force of Will to protect the combo and control the game until the combo can be assembled. The deck aims to win quickly and decisively by utilizing this deadly combo.

The main focus of this deck is to assemble the Dark Depths combo as quickly as possible to create a 20/20 indestructible Marit Lage token. This is achieved through cards like Vampire Hexmage and Thespian's Stage, while also utilizing cards like Life from the Loam and Knight of the Reliquary to tutor for the necessary pieces. The deck also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Swords to Plowshares to control the board and protect the combo. The mana base is built around maximizing the efficiency of the deck's cards, allowing for consistent and powerful plays.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with Dredge cards like Golgari Grave-Troll and Stinkweed Imp, enabling powerful combos with cards like Narcomoeba and Bridge from Below. By utilizing cards like Careful Study and Breakthrough, the deck aims to set up a strong graveyard presence and utilize cards like Cabal Therapy and Dread Return to disrupt the opponent's strategy and close out the game with powerful creatures. The deck also includes some removal and self-mill options to further support the key combo strategy.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana to cast powerful spells like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn through cards like Grim Monolith and Ancient Tomb. The key strategy revolves around using Hive Mind to force opponents to also cast instant win spells, like Pact of the Titan, resulting in a win for the player who controls Hive Mind. Show and Tell can also be used to cheat big creatures into play, overwhelming opponents. Overall, the deck aims to create a fast and overwhelming win condition using combination of powerful spells and unique mechanics.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells like Daze and Force of Will, while also utilizing powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor. It can quickly ramp into threats with Green Sun's Zenith and Natural Order, allowing for explosive plays like fetching Progenitus. The deck also includes versatile cards like Vendilion Clique and Tarmogoyf for disruption and pressure. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistency and flexibility in casting spells. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt opponents while establishing a powerful board presence to win the game.

The main focus of this deck lies in using powerful control cards to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also utilizing the "Stiflenought" combo of Show and Tell and Emrakul, the Aeons Torn to quickly close out the game. The deck includes a mix of counter spells like Force of Will and Pact of Negation to protect your key combo pieces, along with card draw and selection tools like Brainstorm and Ponder to find your combo pieces quickly. The deck also includes mana acceleration in the form of Grim Monolith and lands like Ancient Tomb to power out your big threats ahead of schedule.

The deck aims to use Aluren, a key enchantment, to create a combo with creatures like Parasitic Strix and Cavern Harpy to generate value and advantage. It utilizes Imperial Recruiter to find the necessary pieces and control cards like Force of Will to protect the combo. Brainstorm and Gitaxian Probe help with consistency and card advantage. Intuition allows for powerful set-up plays. The deck includes a variety of lands for consistency and versatility. Overall, the strategy revolves around assembling the combo pieces efficiently and disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures combined with disruptive spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Noble Hierarch and Green Sun's Zenith to ramp up mana, the deck aims to play powerful threats such as Knight of the Reliquary and Stoneforge Mystic. Additionally, the inclusion of counterspells like Spellstutter Sprite and control elements like Jace, the Mind Sculptor help to disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a combination of aggression and disruption, the deck aims to dominate the battlefield and secure victory.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's resources and controlling the board through land destruction and discard spells. It utilizes cards like Pox, Smallpox, Sinkhole, and Hymn to Tourach to strip the opponent's hand and board while maintaining card advantage through Life from the Loam and cycling lands like Barren Moor. The deck also has a win condition in Worm Harvest and Nether Spirit, creating a resilient and disruptive strategy that aims to outlast and outvalue the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Vindicate and The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale further enhances the deck's control elements.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy, using efficient creatures like Wild Nacatl, Tarmogoyf, and Knight of the Reliquary to deal damage quickly. The deck also includes versatile cards like Noble Hierarch and Qasali Pridemage to support its aggressive gameplan. With a mix of disruptive spells like Lightning Bolt and Swords to Plowshares, as well as card advantage from Brainstorm and Jace, the Mind Sculptor, this deck can control the board while applying pressure. Green Sun's Zenith provides additional flexibility by tutoring for key creatures.

The main focus of this Control - Stoneblade deck is to control the game through various card advantage and disruption tools while utilizing the Stoneforge Mystic package to fetch powerful equipment like Batterskull and Sword of the Meek. With a mix of counter spells, removal, and card draw, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver opponents until it can establish a dominant board presence. Wasteland and Mishra's Factory provide additional disruption while the Thopter Foundry - Sword of the Meek combo offers a win condition that can grind out games against a variety of opponents.

The key concept of the deck is to quickly assemble the combo pieces, Hive Mind and Pact spells, to force the opponent into a lose-lose situation. By using cards like Show and Tell and Intuition to put Hive Mind into play, the deck aims to cast Pact spells that the opponent will be unable to pay for, causing them to lose the game. Additional cards like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Force of Will provide alternate win conditions and protection, making it a powerful and fast-paced combo deck in the Legacy format.

This deck focuses on utilizing Illusionary Mask and Torpor Orb to cheat out powerful creatures like Phyrexian Dreadnought and Hunted Horror. Dark Confidant and Tarmogoyf provide card advantage and threats, while disruption cards like Hymn to Tourach and Thoughtseize help control the opponent's hand. The deck also includes removal spells like Maelstrom Pulse and Surgical Extraction to deal with problematic cards. The mana base is built around black and green dual lands, with some Wastelands for disruption. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on quickly putting pressure on the opponent with efficient creatures like Tarmogoyf, Wild Nacatl, and Grim Lavamancer, supported by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning. By utilizing cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Knight of the Reliquary to find equipment like Batterskull and Sword of Body and Mind, the deck can maintain its aggressive pace while also disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Path to Exile and Price of Progress. The mana base is designed to enable consistent access to all colors while also providing utility lands like Wasteland and Karakas.
